title: Did Rashida Tlaib Celebrate the Holocaust, Say It Gave Her a ‘Warm Feeling’?
subtitle: Right-leaning websites grossly distorted the nuanced reflections of the Michigan Congresswoman on what happened in Palestine after World War II.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Rashida Tlaib expressed joy and celebration about the Holocaust, saying it gave her a "warm feeling."
